tag_list: right-to-die, assisted-suicide, euthanasia, final-exit, hemlock-society, derek-humphry, ergo
overview: Derek Humphry is a journalist and author. Former staff writer on London Daily Mail, London Sunday Times and Los Angeles Times. Author of 15 books (over 40 years), including the best-sellers ‘Jean’s Way’ and ‘Final Exit’. Founder of the Hemlock Society USA in l980. Currently president of the Euthanasia Research and Guidance Organization, (ERGO) a nonprofit based in Oregon but working internationally. April 2012.
